column1: Kata Robata////After months of quarantine my roomies and I needed great sushi. I ordered the papaya pork belly salad along with two traditional maki rolls. The salad was large enough to share with the 3 people at my table. I appreciate that the sushi bar will make a simple yellowtail roll or salmon roll
column2: because I love simplicity. All items hit the spot. My boyfriend got his beloved Kobe skewers
column3: and we both had our own carafe of house hot sake. I always aim to get a little tipsy when we come. The only cons were miscommunication. I checked online and still saw happy hour menus
column4: but once there was told they are no longer doing happy hour or the half price sake flights for Tuesday. Overall very satisfied with our first post quarantine sushi.
